name: UCKeyboardLayout
desc: Provides header data for a 'uchr' resource.

items.name: init(keyLayoutHeaderFormat: UInt16, keyLayoutDataVersion: UInt16, keyLayoutFeatureInfoOffset: UInt32, keyboardTypeCount: UInt32, keyboardTypeList: (UCKeyboardTypeHeader))
var keyLayoutDataVersion: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer identifying the version of the data in the resource, in binary code decimal format. For example, 0x0100 would equal version 1.0.

items.name: var keyLayoutFeatureInfoOffset: UInt32
items.desc: An unsigned 32-bit integer providing an offset to a structure of type UCKeyLayoutFeatureInfo, if such is used in the resource. May be 0 if no UCKeyLayoutFeatureInfo table is included in the resource.

items.name: var keyLayoutHeaderFormat: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer identifying the format of the structure. Set to kUCLayoutHeaderFormat.

items.name: var keyboardTypeCount: UInt32
items.desc: An unsigned 32-bit integer specifying the number of UCKeyboardTypeHeader structures in the keyboardTypeList[] fieldâ€™s array.

items.name: var keyboardTypeList: (UCKeyboardTypeHeader)
items.desc: A variable-length array containing structures of type UCKeyboardTypeHeader. Each UCKeyboardTypeHeader entry specifies a range of physical keyboard types and contains offsets to each of the key mapping sections to be used for that range of keyboard types.
